00053 #define ARRAY_SET_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER "1.0"
00054 
00058 class XMLChConversion
00059 {
00060 private:
00062         XMLCh *str;
00063 
00067         void convert(int i)
00068         {
00069                 char cstr[64];
00070                 sprintf(cstr, "%d", i);
00071                 convert(cstr);
00072         }
00073 
00077         void convert(const char *const s)
00078         {
00079                 clear();
00080                 int n=(int)strlen(s);
00081                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00082                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00083                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00084                 str[n]=0;
00085         }
00086 
00090         void convert(const wchar_t *const s)
00091         {
00092                 clear();
00093                 int n=(int)wcslen(s);
00094                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00095                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00096                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00097                 str[n]=0;
00098         }
00099 
00101         void clear()
00102         {
00103                 if (str)
00104                         delete[] str;
00105                 str = NULL;
00106         }
00107 
00108 public:
00112         XMLChConversion(int i) { str=NULL; convert(i); }
00116         XMLChConversion(const wchar_t *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00120         XMLChConversion(std::wstring s) { str=NULL; convert( s.c_str() ); }
00124         XMLChConversion(const char *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00128         XMLChConversion(std::string s) { str=NULL; convert(s.c_str()); }
00130         ~XMLChConversion() { clear(); }
00134         const XMLCh *String() const { return str; }
00135 
00136 };
00137 
00139 #define ToXMLCh(s) ( XMLChConversion(s).String() )

00142 /*
00143  * Create the array element. This is the top level parent element.
00144  */
00145 DOMElement* CreateArrayElement(ArrayData &arrayData, DOMDocument* doc, const AffymetrixGuidType &dataTypeIdentifier)
00146 {
00147         // ArrayFile element
00148         DOMElement* arrayElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT));
00149         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER));
00150         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(ARRAY_SET_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER));
00151         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_ID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.ArraySetFileIdentifier()));
00152         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_PROJECT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.InitialProject()));
00153         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATE_DATE_TIME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.CreationDateTime()));
00154         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATED_BY_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.CreatedBy()));
00155 
00156         std::wstring step = CreateStepToString(arrayData.CreatedStep());
00157         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATED_STEP_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(step));
00158         return arrayElement;
00159 }

00161 /*
00162  * Add the physical arrays to the document if they exist.
00163  */
00164 void AddPhysicalArrays(ArrayData &arrayData, DOMDocument* doc, DOMElement* arrayElement)
00165 {
00166         int nArrays = (int) arrayData.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size();
00167         if (nArrays > 0 )
00168         {
00169                 DOMElement* physicalArraysElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAYS_ELEMENT));
00170                 for (int iArray=0; iArray<nArrays; iArray++)
00171                 {
00172                         ArrayAttributes &att = arrayData.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[iArray];
00173                         DOMElement* physicalArrayElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT));
00174                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_ARRAY_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER));
00175                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_ID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.Identifier()));
00176                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.ArrayName()));
00177                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_BARCODE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.ArrayBarcode()));
00178                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(MediaToString(att.Media())));
00179                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_ROW_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaRow()));
00180                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_COL_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaCol()));
00181                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MEDIA_FILE_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaFileName()));
00182                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MEDIA_FILE_GUID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaFileGUID()));
00183                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_LIB_PACKAGE_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.LibraryPackageName()));
00184                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MASTERFILE_GUID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MasterFileId()));
00185                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_CREATED_BY_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.CreatedBy()));
00186                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_CREATION_DATE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.CreationDateTime()));
00187                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATED_STEP_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(CreateStepToString(att.CreatedStep())));
00188                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MASTERFILE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MasterFile()));
00189                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_PAT_ASSIGNMENT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(PATAssignmentMethodToString(att.PatAssignment())));
00190                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_COMMENT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.Comment()));
00191 
00192                         int nArraysAttributes = (int) att.Attributes().size();
00193                         for (int iArrayAttribute=0; iArrayAttribute<nArraysAttributes; ++iArrayAttribute)
00194                         {
00195                                 ParameterNameValuePair &param = att.Attributes()[iArrayAttribute];
00196                                 DOMElement* paramElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT));
00197                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.Name));
00198                                 paramElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(param.Value));
00199                                 physicalArrayElement->appendChild(paramElement);
00200                         }
00201                         physicalArraysElement->appendChild(physicalArrayElement);
00202                 }
00203                 arrayElement->appendChild(physicalArraysElement);
00204         }
00205 }

00207 /*
00208  * Add the user attributes to the document if they exist.
00209  */
00210 void AddUserAttributes(ArrayData &arrayData, DOMDocument* doc, DOMElement* arrayElement)
00211 {
00212         int nUserAttributes = (int) arrayData.UserAttributes().size();
00213         if (nUserAttributes > 0)
00214         {
00215                 DOMElement* userAttributesElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ELEMENT));
00216 
00217                 affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator paramIt;
00218                 for (paramIt=arrayData.UserAttributes().begin(); paramIt!=arrayData.UserAttributes().end(); ++ paramIt)
00219                 {
00220                         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType &param = *paramIt;
00221                         DOMElement* paramElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT));
00222                         paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.GetName()));
00223                         paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(
00224                                 ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ParameterValueTypeToString(param.ValueType())));
00225                         if (param.RequiredFlag() == true)
00226                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh("true"));
00227                         if (param.HasDefault() == true)
00228                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_DEFAULT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.DefaultToString()));
00229 
00230                         if (param.ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType)
00231                         {
00232                                 std::list<std::wstring>::iterator valIt;
00233                                 for (valIt = param.ControlMultiValues().begin(); valIt != param.ControlMultiValues().end(); ++valIt)
00234                                 {
00235                                         DOMElement *valueElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ELEMENT));
00236                                         valueElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(*valIt));
00237                                         paramElement->appendChild(valueElement);
00238                                 }
00239                         }
00240                         else
00241                         {
00242                                 DOMElement *valueElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ELEMENT));
00243                                 valueElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(param.ToString()));
00244                                 paramElement->appendChild(valueElement);
00245                         }
00246 
00247                         int nControl = (int) param.ControlledVocabulary().size();
00248                         if (nControl > 0)
00249                         {
00250                                 std::list<std::wstring>::iterator controlIt;
00251                                 for (controlIt=param.ControlledVocabulary().begin(); controlIt!=param.ControlledVocabulary().end(); ++controlIt)
00252                                 {
00253                                         DOMElement* controlElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_CONTROL_ELEMENT));
00254                                         controlElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_CONTROL_ELEMENT_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(*controlIt));
00255                                         paramElement->appendChild(controlElement);
00256                                 }
00257                         }
00258                         userAttributesElement->appendChild(paramElement);
00259                 }
00260                 arrayElement->appendChild(userAttributesElement);
00261         }
00262 }

00279 /*
00280  * Write the entire file, the header and body.
00281  */
00282 bool ArrayFileWriter::Write(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_array::ArrayData &arrayData)
00283 {
00284         // Initialize the XML4C2 system.
00285         try
00286         {
00287                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00288         }
00289         catch (const XMLException&)
00290         {
00291                 return false;
00292         }
00293 
00294         // Create a DOM implementation object and create the document type for it.
00295         DOMImplementation *impl = DOMImplementationRegistry::getDOMImplementation(ToXMLCh(L"LS"));
00296         //DOMDocumentType* dt  = impl->createDocumentType(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT), 0, ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_DTD));
00297         DOMDocument* doc = impl->createDocument();
00298         //doc->setStandalone(true);
00299         //doc->appendChild(dt);
00300 
00301         // Create the serializer.
00302         DOMLSSerializer *theSerializer = ((DOMImplementationLS*)impl)->createLSSerializer();
00303         DOMLSOutput     *theOutputDesc = ((DOMImplementationLS*)impl)->createLSOutput();
00304         //theSerializer->setEncoding(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ENCODING));
00305         theOutputDesc->setEncoding(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ENCODING));
00306 
00307         // ArrayFile element
00308         DOMElement* arrayElement = CreateArrayElement(arrayData, doc, dataTypeIdentifier);
00309 
00310         // PhysicalArrays element
00311         AddPhysicalArrays(arrayData, doc, arrayElement);
00312 
00313         // UserAttributes element
00314         AddUserAttributes(arrayData, doc, arrayElement);
00315 
00316         // Add the array element to the document.
00317         doc->appendChild(arrayElement);
00318 
00319         // Write the file.
00320         bool status = false;
00321         XMLFormatTarget *myFormTarget = new LocalFileFormatTarget(fileName.c_str());
00322         theOutputDesc->setByteStream(myFormTarget);
00323         try
00324         {
00325                 theSerializer->write(doc, theOutputDesc);
00326                 status = true;
00327         }
00328         catch (...)
00329         {
00330                 status = false;
00331         }
00332 
00333         // Clean up
00334         doc->release();
00335         theOutputDesc->release();
00336         theSerializer->release();
00337         delete myFormTarget;
00338         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00339 
00340         return status;
00341 }
